activities: Yelp Inc. receives, stores, and processes personal data from users, prospective, current and former employees, and individual contacts of corporate customers (including advertisers), suppliers, service providers and other business partners within the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland for purposes of (i) global workforce administration and management and (ii) providing business listing, transactional, advertising and consumer review services to its users and businesses. Yelp Inc. typically receives such data from Yelp Ireland Ltd., or from their respective subsidiaries in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland that provide sales and marketing services or other services for Yelp Ireland Ltd.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organizational and customer data, client data, user data, human resources data
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities; i.e., EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
